objects.src: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 1080 1080'><defs><linearGradient id='grad1' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#f8f8f8;stop-opacity:1'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#e8e8e8;stop-opacity:1'/></linearGradient><linearGradient id='grad2' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='0%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#c41230;stop-opacity:0.8'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#c41230;stop-opacity:0'/></linearGradient></defs><rect width='1080' height='1080' fill='url(#grad1)'/><rect x='40' y='40' width='1000' height='1000' rx='15' stroke='#c41230' stroke-width='5' fill='none'/><rect x='60' y='60' width='960' height='960' rx='10' stroke='#c41230' stroke-width='2' stroke-dasharray='5,5' fill='none'/><path d='M0,150 C150,100 300,200 450,150 C600,100 750,200 900,150 C1050,100 1200,200 1350,150' stroke='#c41230' stroke-width='8' opacity='0.2' fill='none'/><path d='M0,930 C150,880 300,980 450,930 C600,880 750,980 900,930 C1050,880 1200,980 1350,930' stroke='#c41230' stroke-width='8' opacity='0.2' fill='none'/><path d='M200,0 C150,150 250,300 200,450 C150,600 250,750 200,900 C150,1050 250,1200 200,1350' stroke='#c41230' stroke-width='8' opacity='0.2' fill='none'/><path d='M880,0 C830,150 930,300 880,450 C830,600 930,750 880,900 C830,1050 930,1200 880,1350' stroke='#c41230' stroke-width='8' opacity='0.2' fill='none'/><rect x='80' y='80' width='920' height='920' rx='5' fill='#ffffff' opacity='0.7'/><polygon points='0,0 300,0 0,300' fill='url(#grad2)' opacity='0.2'/><polygon points='1080,1080 780,1080 1080,780' fill='url(#grad2)' opacity='0.2'/><circle cx='540' cy='540' r='400' fill='#c41230' opacity='0.03'/><circle cx='540' cy='540' r='300' fill='#c41230' opacity='0.05'/></svg>

objects.text:
• Exceptional Grip in All Weather Conditions
• AeroReady Moisture-Wicking Technology
• PrimeKnit Mesh for Support & Structure
• Custom Fit with Superior Fingertip Design

product_details.description: Always be ready to play with the Adizero 11 Receiver’s Gloves from adidas! Designed to provide exceptional comfort and grip to keep up with intense gameplay. This glove features box fingertip construction to deliver an unbeatable fit for your fingertips, without any pinching or tightness. It includes a custom injection molded rubber tab with no-snag hook and loop closure to make sure it is always secure. Enhance your game with the Adizero 11 Football Gloves for receivers! Our football receiver gloves are carefully made with engineered PrimeKnit Mesh to provide the structure, support, and performance you deserve. They are designed with GripTack - an exclusive palm treatment that ensures amazing grip and performance in all weather conditions, while AeroReady technology wicks away moisture and keeps your hands cool and dry. Plus, our receiver gloves include 4-way stretch multi-dimensional fabric that naturally mimics the movements and motion of your hand, delivering supreme accuracy that will keep you ready for the next play. All adidas football gloves are certified to meet SFIA specifications required for in-game use. Experience each play like never before with the Adizero 11 Gloves! 35% Polyester, 34% Nylon, 17% Silicone, 11% Spandex, 3% Chloroprene Rubber Imported READY TO PLAY: Always be ready for every game with the adidas Adizero 11 Receiver Gloves for Football! Designed with exclusive technology, high-quality materials, and exceptional comfort, these football gloves will keep you prepared for any play. UNBEATABLE GRIP: Our durable football gloves feature GripTack - an adidas exclusive palm treatment that provides unparalleled grip and performance in all weather conditions. You will be able to rely on these gloves to help expertly catch every ball! AEROREADY: Never fumble with sweaty palms again with these adult football gloves. Featuring AEROREADY technology on the back of the hand and fourchette material, our exclusive gloves provide amazing moisture wicking to keep your hands dry and cool. DESIGNED FOR COMFORT: Engineered with 11.0 PrimeKnit mesh, these superior football gloves deliver optimal structure, support, and performance. They have an ergonomically designed pattern to fully mimic natural hand movements and motion. THE PERFECT FOOTBALL GLOVE: Custom fit features for high-level performance such as a compression fit, venting without binding, breathability, dexterity, flexibility, superior fingertip construction, increased range of motion and a no-snag hook and loop closure for a perfect fit. Brand - adidas ** Material - Polyester, Nylon ** Size - Medium ** Sport - Football ** Age Range (Description) - Adult ** Color - Black/White ** Special Feature - Ther, Moisture Wicking, Breathable ** Hand Orientation - Ambidextrous ** Item Package Quantity - 1 ** Product Care Instructions - Hand Wash Only **

banner_details:
The banner has a clean white background adorned with decorative red vector paths and bordered by double red-outline rectangles—one solid and the other dashed. Centered visually is a high-resolution glove image labeled as the product focus (`product_image`). The headline (`heading`) is displayed in bold red futuristic font on the upper left, followed by a black subheading (`subheading`) identifying the product type. A thin red divider line (`decorative`) separates the title area from key features listed in a black text block (`description`). The bold red price (`price`) is placed at bottom left, adjacent to a vivid red call-to-action button (`cta_background`) with white text (`cta`).

**Color Palette:**
- Red: #c41230
- Black: #333333
- White: #ffffff
- Gradient shades: #f8f8f8 ➝ #e8e8e8
product_color: The product features a sleek and sporty color palette dominated by crisp white (#F5F5F5) as the base color, accented by bold deep red (#AA1E23) and subtle touches of metallic silver (#D9D9D9) on the wrist strap design. The red is strategically used in the perforated vents, Adidas branding, and inner thumb panel to create strong visual contrast and highlight performance areas. The integration of red within the white background makes the glove visually appealing and energetic while keeping the look clean and professional. These colors are smoothly blended yet contrasted, giving prominence to branding and enhancing the modern, athletic aesthetic.
